data.lyric:
[ti:Got What I Got]
[ar:Jason Aldean]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.64]Got What I Got - Jason Aldean
[00:11.66]She said baby do you ever miss bein' alone
[00:16.13]I said hell no I don't
[00:20.53]She said do you really think I'm where you belong
[00:25.03]I said you know and I know
[00:27.44]You're perfect for me
[00:29.69]Everything I'll ever need
[00:31.55]I ain't playin'
[00:34.19]What I'm sayin'
[00:36.47]When I got what I got I don't miss what I had
[00:41.12]The old me before you belongs to the past
[00:45.07]In the back of your mind you might think there's somethin' more I want
[00:52.00]But when I got what I got girl I don't
[01:05.47]I said baby do you know you sound a little crazy
[01:10.17]When you're talkin' like that girl
[01:14.29]Ain't no second thoughts no regrets no kinda maybe
[01:19.18]No wishin' I turned back
[01:21.52]Before you came along
[01:23.67]I could go all alone
[01:25.55]Girl just kiss me
[01:28.08]You're all that I want
[01:30.09]When I got what I got I don't miss what I had
[01:35.18]The old me before you belongs to the past
[01:39.03]In the back of your mind you might think there's somethin' more I want
[01:46.04]But when I got what I got girl I don't
[02:08.64]She said baby do you ever miss bein' alone
[02:13.18]I said hell no I don't
[02:15.41]When I got what I got I don't miss what I had
[02:20.07]The old me before you belongs to the past
[02:24.07]In the back of your mind you might think there's somethin' more I want
[02:31.10]But when I got what I got girl I don't
[02:35.45]No I don't
[02:37.58]No I don't
[02:40.00]When I got what I got girl I don't
data.trans:
[ti:Got What I Got]
[ar:Jason Aldean]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.64]//
[00:11.66]她说 宝贝 你可曾怀念过一个人的时候
[00:16.13]我说 当然没有
[00:20.53]她说 你真的觉得我们合适吗
[00:25.03]我说 你知道 我也知道
[00:27.44]你和我是天作之合
[00:29.69]你就是我需要的一切
[00:31.55]我没开玩笑
[00:34.19]我是认真的
[00:36.47]当我拥有眼前的幸福 我就不会怀念过去
[00:41.12]遇到你之前那个我就应该埋葬在过去
[00:45.07]在你的内心深处 可能觉得我想要的不仅如此
[00:52.00]但是当我拥有眼前的幸福 我就不需要其他的
[01:05.47]我说 宝贝 你知道吗 当你说出那样的话时
[01:10.17]我觉得有点不可思议 姑娘
[01:14.29]不假思索 绝不后悔 没有如果
[01:19.18]我从不渴望回到过去
[01:21.52]要不是遇到了你
[01:23.67]我可能还在独自前行
[01:25.55]姑娘 吻我
[01:28.08]你就是我想要的全部
[01:30.09]当我拥有眼前的幸福 我就不会怀念过去
[01:35.18]遇到你之前那个我就应该埋葬在过去
[01:39.03]在你的内心深处 可能觉得我想要的不仅如此
[01:46.04]但是当我拥有眼前的幸福 我就不需要其他的
[02:08.64]她说 宝贝 你可曾怀念过一个人的时候
[02:13.18]我说 当然没有
[02:15.41]当我拥有眼前的幸福 我就不会怀念过去
[02:20.07]遇到你之前那个我就应该埋葬在过去
[02:24.07]在你的内心深处 可能觉得我想要的不仅如此
[02:31.10]但是当我拥有眼前的幸福 我就不需要其他的
[02:35.45]我不需要
[02:37.58]我不需要
[02:40.00]当我拥有眼前的幸福 我就不需要其他的
